name: sculptural
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
made by shaping a material such as wood, clay, metal, or stone: Her delicate sculptural pieces (= works of art) are now selling in the USA and Japan. See
sculpture
More examplesFewer examplesHe has created a number of sly sculptural works. Each roof plane has added sculptural detail. Both sculptural pieces exhibit imagination and personality. The sculptural stainless-steel facade marked the first use of the style for which he has become famous. The cover is a sculptural image of the face of a Mayan goddess, fashioned from recycled cardboard mixed with corn silk and coffee.
